title: Suggestions: books about typography in Portuguese
content:
I made a quick search and didn't find any topic like this, only the existing [Advice please: on useful old books to add to Typophile’s library](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103412/http:/typophile.com/node/33915), which is not the case, I think. So I'd like to suggest some books about typography to be added to Typophile's library, all of them available in Portuguese:

Pensar Com Tipos. -Lupton, Ellen. Cosac Naify, 2006. (translated from Thinking With Type)

O que é a tipografia. -Jury, David. Gustavo Gili, 2007.

História da Tipografia no Brasil. -Semeraro, Claudia M. & Ayrosa, Christiane. Museu de Arte de São Paulo (MASP), 1979.

Thanks!

Henrique
author: hbeier
